name: CHARACTER CRAFTING
desc: Unlocks crafting

name: STONE PILE
desc: A pile of stones.

name: WOOD PILE
desc: Stack and store wood.

name: STONE AXE
desc: A roughly-made axe, but fells trees well enough.

name: STONE PICKAXE
desc: Break rocks with stone.

name: CAMPFIRE
desc: A place to cook food and fend the cold away.

name: BEDROLL
desc: More restorative than sleeping on bare ground.

name: WOOD SPEAR
desc: Simple to make, easy to break.

name: BONE SPEAR
desc: A bone blade improves mellee and ranged damage.

name: FIREPIT
desc: A large, stone-line pit for swift cooking and heating.

name: FIRE WHACKER
desc: Quickly beats out fires.

name: STONE KNIFE
desc: A basic hunting tool, strong and sharp enough ... just.

name: BONE KNIFE
desc: Stronger, lighter, and sharper than its stone cousin.

name: BONE SICKLE
desc: Repurposed remains for easy reaping.

name: WOOD RAG TORCH
desc: An easily crafted source of illumination.

name: WOOD TORCH
desc: A longer burning source of light in the darkness.

name: FLOOR TORCH
desc: A free-standing torch requiring sticks for fuel.

name: WOOD REPAIR HAMMER
desc: Maintain your structures against the wrath of Icarus.

name: BUILDING UPGRADE TOOL
desc: Improve your structures without tearing them down.

name: BASIC BANDAGE
desc: Cloth bandages to stem bleeding and heal minor wounds.

name: SUTURE KIT
desc: A basic medical kit for healing deep wounds.

name: WOOD BOW
desc: A primitive bow with limited range and durability.

name: STONE ARROW
desc: The most basic version of an ancient weapon.

name: SPLINT
desc: Speeds the healing of a broken leg.

name: HEAT BANDAGE
desc: Cloth bandages impregnated with a warming salve, for treating frostbite.

name: BONE ARROW
desc: A primitive arrow, dealing greater damage than flint or stone.

name: FLARE ARROW
desc: Projects your position into the sky.

name: ANTI-PARASITIC PASTE
desc: A medical preparation for reducing the effects of festering wounds.

name: ANTI-POISON PASTE
desc: A basic toixcology and anti-venom kit to reduce the effects of poisoning.

name: FIRE ARROW
desc: Share the warmth.

name: POISON ARROW
desc: Slow death, with a point.

name: BLOOD THINNING PASTE
desc: A folk remedy for diminishing the effects of concussions and contusions.

name: ANTIBIOTIC PASTE
desc: Reduces the effects of food poisoning, and other low grade infections.
